thread.title: PHOTO: Arkansas mascot sends recently retired Bevo a going away present
thread.title_full: PHOTO: Arkansas mascot sends recently retired Bevo a going away present

title: PHOTO: Arkansas mascot sends recently retired Bevo a going away present
text:
7:07p ET 
Tusk the mascot wasn't going to let the Arkansas, Texas rivalry stop him from sending fellow mascot Bevo a retirement gift this week. Upon hearing the diagnosis of cancer, forcing Bevo to an early retirement, Tusk sent this gift to the Longhorn mascot: true Thank you @Tusk_UA for the retirement gift. Very kind of you to think of me. Best of luck the rest of the season pic.twitter.com/bnTKCEsuOn â€” BEVO XIV (@BEVO_XIV) October 15, 2015 
Texas announced the retirement of Bevo XIV Tuesday after 11 years of serving as the team's mascot. 
The Arkansas, Texas rivalry dates back to 1903, with the Longhorns currently holding a 56-22 edge in the series. MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our College Football newsletters.
